ctu_text:
**Step 2:** Login using credentials. From the list of awards, select "Vayoshreshtha Samman - National Awards for Senior Citizens", then click "Nominate / Apply Now". **Step 3:** On the next page, fill in all the mandatory fields in the online application form, and then click "Submit".
